General.Name: Ningbo Deye Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Deye Technology Group Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sales of heat exchangers, inverters, and dehumidifiers in China, the United Kingdom, the United States, Germany, India, and internationally. It offers household, industrial, fresh air, pipe ceiling, and rotary dehumidifiers, as well as integrated dehumidification and humidification machines, constant temperature and humidity machines, and various customized non-standard air treatment equipment; solar and utility power driven frequency conversion air conditioners and water pump products; and PCBA supporting solutions for the home appliance industry. The company also provides photovoltaic inverter solutions, including residential and commercial power station solutions; solar energy storage system solutions; and supplies grid-tied string inverters, energy storage inverters, and grid-tied micro inverters. In addition, it offers heat exchangers comprising evaporators and condensers for used in household air conditioners, commercial air conditioners, dehumidifiers, and special refrigeration and heating equipment. Ningbo Deye Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Ningbo, China.
General.Address: No.26-28 Southern Yongjiang Road, Ningbo, China
